subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Afghanistan’s first match at a Cricket World Cup ended in defeat when Bangladesh took three wickets in the first three overs on the way to winning by 105 runs in Canberra, Australia.
snippet: Afghanistan’s first match at a Cricket World Cup ended in defeat when Bangladesh took three wickets in the first three overs on the way to winning by 105 runs in Canberra, Australia.
